article: Nancy would like to take part in a fancy - dress party . She had to go to the party with her friends because her husband has been to another city to go on a business trip . Later that night , she was busy in dressing up herself as a ghost , including putting on masks and some special costumes . After finishing it , she went downstairs to look at herself in the mirror . Suddenly , there was a knock on the front door . She knew that it must be the baker . She had told him to come straight in if ever she failed to open the door and to leave the bread on the kitchen table . Not wanting to frighten the poor man , Nancy quickly hid in the storeroom under the stairs . To her surprise , it was her husband who changed his plan and came back home 2 days earlier . The husband called his wife ' s name happily and looked for her all around . Nancy was so excited that she ran to her husband without realizing she was a ghost at that moment . But it was too late . Her husband let out a cry and jumped back several steps . Then he lost his sense and lay on the ground .
